From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To provide a description of the location of a serial device, use the **location** command in line configuration mode. To remove the description, use the **no** form of this command.
Examples: In the following example, the location description for the console line is given as "Building 3, Basement":
ExtraInfo: The **location** command enters information about the device location and status. Use the **show users all** EXEC command to display the location information.
